column4: Anybody willing to help?  What commandline utility can I use to see what services are set to start on boot?
is there something wrong with System/Preferences/Startup Apps

i just installed ubuntu 10.10 on my desktop and my laptop. i transferred the .purple config files for pidgin from the desktop to the laptop through the cat5 LAN. Is this an acceptable transfer rate? it seems incredibly slow. http://i.imgur.com/I19gt.png
Yep, I don't have GNOME installed on this box, or any other desktop environment for that matter.
